title: Fishing Planet: Thanksgiving Cornucopia Pack

longDescription:
<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Thanksgiving Cornucopia Pack
<!--text-->
Join in on the Thanksgiving fishing tradition with the Thanksgiving Cornucopia Pack! What’s more delicious than roast turkey, tastier than a slice of pumpkin pie, more satisfying than the Thanksgiving dinner? That's right, only Thanksgiving at Fishing Planet's boundless reservoirs!

Exclusively for Thanksgiving, we present to you the Thanksgiving Cornucopia Pack! It is your Horn of Plenty in the world of float fishing! Jam-packed with exclusive goodies, the Thanksgiving Cornucopia Pack features limited-edition telescopic rods that are available exclusively in this Pack! Just imagine your Thanksgiving with the wild-spirited Tomahawk 650, the adventurous pilgrim’s Blunderbuss 700 and the Thanksgiving special CrazyTurkey 700 that will turn your holiday fishing into an epicly fun pilgrimage!

And what’s more, this is your only opportunity to get the exclusive Thanksgiving edition true Pilgrim’s Doublet that gives you more tackle and line storage capacity. The Thanksgiving Cornucopia Pack also includes spin reels, lines, hooks, a large Keepnet and bait galore! 

Thanksgiving Cornucopia Pack includes:
* 10 000 CREDITS
* 10 BAITCOINS
* 7-DAYS PREMIUM
* 30 Slots
* 3 Tackle Setup Slots

RODS ‘N REELS
Rods:
* Flaggmann™ Tomahawk 21' 3" (650) - Length: 21' 3" (6.5 m); Line Weight: 2–6.1 Lb (1–2.75 kg); Action: Mod Fast
* Garry Scott™ CrazyTurkey 23' (700) - Length: 23' (7 m); Line Weight: 3–10 Lb (1.5–4.5 kg); Action: Mod Fast
* Garry Scott™ Blunderbuss 23' (700) - Length: 23' (7 m); Line Weight: 3–13 Lb (1.5–6.0 kg); Action: Mod Fast

Reels:
* MagFin™ Pocahontas™ Thanksgiving Edition - Ratio: 5.3; Recovery: 23.5" (60 cm); Capacity: Mono 3/120 (0.12/120), Braid 6/120 (0.12/120); Max Drag: 5.95 Lb (2.7 kg); Drag: Front
* Flaggmann™ MapleBerry™ Thanksgiving Edition - Ratio: 5.2; Recovery: 31.5" (80 cm); Capacity: Mono 12/120 (0.3/120), Braid 20/160 (0.23/160); Max Drag: 9.9 Lb (4.5 kg); Drag: Front
* MagFin™ PeacePipe™ Thanksgiving Edition - Ratio: 5.5; Recovery: 36.5" (93 cm); Capacity: Mono 20/110 (0.4/110), Braid 30/145 (0.28/145); Max Drag: 13 Lb (5.9 kg); Drag: Front

TERMINAL TACKLE
* Lines - Length: 1000 yd (1000 m):
Mono .009" (0.23 mm) - Test: 6 Lb (2.7 kg)
Braid .008" (0.2 mm) - Test: 10 Lb (4.5 kg)
Fluoro .012" (0.3 mm) - Test: 12 Lb (5.5 kg)

* Bobbers: Sport Bobber, Slim, Glowing Slim Float
* Hooks: Hook #12 (x10), Hook #10 (x10), Hook #8 (x10), Hook #6 (x10), Hook #4 (x10), Hook #2 (x10), Hook #1 (x10), Hook #1/0 (x10), Hook #2/0 (x10), Hook #3/0 (x10)
* Barbless Hooks: Barbless Hook #4 (x10), Barbless Hook #2 (x10), Barbless Hook #1 (x10), Barbless Hook #1/0 (x10), Barbless Hook #2/0 (x10), Barbless Hook #3/0 (x10)
* Baits: Bread (x50), Cheese (x50), Pet Food (x50), Dough Balls (x50), Corn (x150), Peas (x50), Semolina Balls (x50), Marshmallows (x50), Sweet Corn (x150)
* Golden Corn (x150)

EQUIPMENT
* Garry Scott™ FishFort M Keepnet  - Max Single Fish Weight: 44 Lb (20 kg); Total Fish Weight: 220 Lb (100 kg); Fish-Friendly: Yes
* Pilgrim's Doublet Waistcoat  - Tackles: 15; Lines: 5
* CozyHatchet™ Rod Case  - Rods: 3; Reels: 6; Lines: 3

FISHING LICENSES (7 days):
Advanced North Carolina License
Advanced Missouri License
Advanced Colorado License
Advanced New York License
Advanced California License
Advanced Michigan License
Advanced Texas License
Advanced Louisiana License
Advanced Czech License
Advanced Netherlands License
Advanced Italy License

POND PASSES (7 days):
Neherrin River
Mudwater River
Rocky Lake
Emerald Lake
San Joaquin Delta
Saint-Croix Lake
Quanchkin Lake
Lesní Víla Fishery
Ghent–Terneuzen Canal
Tiber River
